page.title: 10Farming, Employment.
page.content: "Manner's Farm",one of the biggest in our area, is a mixed farm of 368 acres. here are 16 fields,14 are used for crops(oil seed rape, turnips, wheat and barley) and 2 fields are given over to cattle.They have 3,000 hens which lay 2,000 eggs every day.The farm is highly mechanised.There are 2 combine harvesters, 6 tractors,a seed drill,4 trailers,a bailer,a grass cutter and turner and a fork lift.The most valuable crop is the oil seed rape which is processed into vegetable oil. The cattle, when fat, are sent to the farm's own abbatoir.There are only a few trees on the farm, but hedges separate the fields.The oldest building is sandstone.New sheds and byres are built with breeze blocks and metal girders.They employ 2 full time workers and 1 part-time lady who grades eggs.
